# EAGER Research Program

The NIH-funded **Project EAGER** at CSU Fullerton provides undergraduate students with hands-on experience in genomics, bioinformatics, and research communication. Through workshops, seminars, and mentored research, we explored how computational tools can be used to study biological systems and big data in modern biology.

Learn more about the program here:

### RNA-seq Pipeline (Work in Progress)
I am currently developing an R-based pipeline to reproduce the analysis used to examine protein and gene expression under heat stress conditions. This pipeline includes data preprocessing, quality control, normalization, and exploratory analysis steps, and will be updated as I complete more of the workflow.
